text: Drury is an outer suburb of Auckland. It is located 36 kilometers south of the city centre and 12 kilometers northeast of Pukekohe and is close the Manukau Harbour. It has a primary school that opened in 1857. It has a Catholic high school opening in early 2024. == References == Category:Towns in Auckland Region Category:Suburbs of Auckland Category:Franklin Local Board Area
title: Drury, New Zealand
